syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

learning_objectives.description: describe and understand the terms (a) stationary phase; a high boiling point non-polar liquid (on a solid support) (b) mobile phase; an unreactive gas (c) retention time
interpret gas/liquid chromatograms in terms of the percentage composition of a mixture
explain retention times in terms of interaction with the stationary phase
